title: Unidocs.ezPDF.Reader.for.iPad.v2.291.iPad-DVTPDA

Unidocs ezPDF Reader for iPad v.91 
 iPad

 Url ......:  
 
  
  
 
 

 
Release Information  


  
 We also provide a PC based PDF tool program for  
  FREE.
  - Add hyperlinks and embed audio/video files.  
  Download Program from PC : <a href="
http://www.unidocs.com/products/ezPDFMultimediaPDFMaker.zip" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.unidocs.com/products/ezPDFMultimediaPDFMaker.zip</a> 
  Redeem Code : 3ed666f79  
  User Guide : 
  
  
  Only PDF viewer with the embedded multimedia file 
  playing capability feature. Easy Annotations and  
  PDF Form Filling.

  Twitter @ezpdf
  Facebook @ezpdfa 
  
 For the business use of our solution or eBook 
  productions, please contact us for our library/API
  at info (at) unidocs.com  
 
* TTS Feature is added with In-App Purchase. 
  Supporting English, Chinese, Japanese & Korean.
  * Please turn off the silent mode to hear from 
 speaker.  
  
 
  ==> Customized Viewing 
 
Documents appear as they would on your PC, but  
  customized to fit your mobile device's screen. 
  Scanned and text based PDFs are all supported, 
 including JPEG000 and JBIG compression. (Must set 
 PDF viewing option to Slow/More feature from  
  Settings) Select Text Reflow, Fit to Text Column, 
  Copy and paste text in PDF view and bookmark as you  
  go.  
- Smart zooming by double-tapping to fit block  
  width
  - Portrait & Landscape view  
 - Brightness Control  
 - Thumbnail Image View
  - Text reflow with font size, color & font style  
  (bold & italic)  
  - Night reading mode supported for text reflow 
- Play embedded multimedia files of audio and video
  files
  - Embedded hyperlinks are live (Go To Page and 
 URLs)  
 - Text Selection and then Copy, Web Search, or send 
  to Email, Twitter, Facebook. 
  - Text search and highlighted result  
  - Page scroll vertical/horizontal  
- Page read direction from left to right/from right
  to left 
  - Page Navigation - by page number, random select 
 (just 4 FUN) 
 - Page auto slide mode
  - Bookmarks
  - Show hyperlinks
  - Outlines 
- Open standard password-protected PDF file  
  - Lock / Unlock screen 
  - Dual Document View
 - Smart URL Parameter 
  
  ==> PDF Form Filler 
 
  If the PDF file is designed with form filling  
feature, you can simply type in the form field and 
  apply marks on buttons. Good for application forms,  
  school tests, and contracts. Fill out your Tax Form  
 with ezPDF Reader. Fill out the contract form, sign 
 at the bottom, and send via email from the file  
  manager.
  - Fill in form, check buttons and choose from list
  - Clear form  
- Import, export and email form data
  - Flatten form
 
 ==> Multimedia PDF Viewer - Audio and Video
  
  ezPDF Reader is designed specifically for PDF  
  documents and contents, but also able to play  
  multimedia files embedded into PDF. Perfect 
solution for PDF based audio/video-enabled Ebooks, 
  such as children's books and instructional books. 
  For the Multimedia Cookbook based on our 
 technology, search for "Celebration at the Sarayi"  
 from the App Store.
 
  ==> Annotation Features on PDF  
 
Useful tool to add text in text box and sticky  
  notes; highlight, underline, or cross out texts;  
  draw lines, arrows, rectangles, ovals, free text, 
 image and freehand drawings. Add memo, change color 
 / thickness, resize and move them around as you  
  like. All these comments are compatible with AdobeÃ‚Â®  
  AcrobatÃ‚Â®. (PC or Mac version)
  - Show, import, export and email annotation list  
- show and hide annotation tool bar 
  - Flatten annotations  
 
 ==> PDF Documents  
 - Create blank PDF file  
  - Add blank page 
  - Crop page
  - Save As  
- Attach files 
  - Send PDF file via email 
  - Show document information  
 - Print
  
  ==> Support for other file formats 
 
  Supports Microsoft Office, Audio (mp3, wav, aac,  
aa, aiff), Video (mp4, mov, mpv, 3gp), Images,  
  Zipped Images, Text and HTML, Annotations XML files  
 
 ==> Functions for File Management 
  
  Interaction with clouding services - Google Docs, 
  Dropbox 
  File list view and File cover view 
Sorting by Name / Date / File Size / File Extension
  Type 
  File search by File Name  
 List of the recently-viewed PDF files
 Various file transfer to device - USB transfer via  
  iTunes, WiFi connection, URL link download  
  Convenient file management - Folder Creation / Copy  
  / Cut / Paste / Delete / Rename 

 
  What's New in Version .91: 
 Display Page on pdf view.
 Improved Link List.
  Bug fixed for Audio Play. 
 
 

 
  
  
 
 

 
Install Notes  


  
 1. Unpack & Install
